# Comparison with @magnetic/tooltip

| Props            | MDS | CDS  |
| ---------------- | --- | ---- |
| className        | ✅  | ✅   |
| disabled         | ✅  | ✅   |
| open             | ✅  | ✅   |
| placement        |     | ✅   |
| setOpen          | ✅  | ✅   |
| title            | ✅  | ✅   |
| kind             | ✅  | ✅\* |
| offset           | -   | ✅   |
| showArrow        | -   | ✅   |
| variant          | -   | ✅   |
| autoPlacement    | -   | ✅   |
| root             | -   | ✅   |
| preserveTabOrder | -   | ✅   |

> 1 - `kind` prop changed to `variant`.
